title: Structural insights into the human NuA4/TIP60 acetyltransferase and chromatin remodeling complex | Science
content: The human nucleosome acetyltransferase of histone H4 (NuA4)/Tat-interactive protein, 60 kilodalton (TIP60) coactivator complex, a fusion of the yeast switch/sucrose nonfermentable related 1 (SWR1) and NuA4 complexes, both incorporates the histone variant ...
